intervention_catalogue.name: Stepping Stones
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Stepping Stones is designed to support practitioners hold discussions and complete exercises with men on probation to help them lead an offence-free life.
long_description: Stepping Stones is designed to support practitioners hold discussions and complete exercises with men on probation to help them lead an offence-free life.
It can be used in a flexible way and tailored to meet the needs of each man.

It offers practical exercises to use in supervision with men on licence or a community order. The primary focus is on strengthening and developing the protective factors identified in the Risk of Serious Harm (RoSH) guidance 2021, to support rehabilitation and reduce re-offending.

exclusion.convicted_for_offence_type: This toolkit is not suitable for men convicted of a sexual offence.
